description: This file contains CSS rules for styling a todo application with light and dark theme management. It defines various CSS variables for colors and includes styles for components like the application header and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the todo application, centers content and applies theme-based styles.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the app providing layout and style consistent with theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with specific styles on hover and active states.
